thread.title: Motorola to celebrate 3rd anniversary with amazing sale, exchange offer on Flipkart - Zee News
thread.title_full: Motorola to celebrate 3rd anniversary with amazing sale, exchange offer on Flipkart - Zee News

title: Motorola to celebrate 3rd anniversary with amazing sale, exchange offer on Flipkart - Zee News
text:
Motorola to celebrate 3rd anniversary with amazing sale, exchange offer on Flipkart By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Sunday, February 19, 2017 - 20:14 0 
New Delhi: Motorola is celebrating its 3 years of presence with Moto products in the country. As part of its celebrations, Motorola is giving its products on massive discounts and also on exchange with a two-day sale. 
Motorola Moto M: Key features you must know 
The 'Moto Days' sale will start from February 20 to February 21 on Flipkart. Users can get discount of up to Rs 20,000 while purchasing certain new Moto models, great exchange offers and a flat discounts of up to Rs 1,000 on a few models. 
Furthermore, Indus Ind Credit card holders will get an additional 10 percent discount on purchase of the products. 
Check out some offers 
Moto Z, Moto Z Play: Extra Rs 2,000 off and Combo offer on Moto Mods 
Moto M: From Rs 15,999 and Extra Rs 1,000 off 
Moto E3 Power: Flat Rs 500 off 
Moto G Turbo Edition: Flat Rs 3,500 off 
Moto 360 (2nd gem): Minimum Rs 4,000 off 
Moto Mods: Upto Rs 5,000 off on Purchase with Moto Z, Z Play 
Moto Accessories: From Rs 899 
Moto Headphones: From Rs 449 
First Published: Sunday, February 19, 2017 - 20:09 More from zeenews
